Abstract: Michael Kimmelman article says Picasso's Guernica, the most famous painting of 20th century, is due for major downgrading in next century; photo (S)
Snippet: Michael Kimmelman article says Picasso's Guernica, the most famous painting of 20th century, is due for major downgrading in next century; photo (S)
LeadParagraph: The challenge put to The Times's critics was direct: Name a 20th-century work considered ''timeless'' today that you think will be all but forgotten in 100 years. Their selections:

Headline.Main: Great Hits Headed for The Attic
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS; Great Hits Headed for The Attic
